name: Gillette Blue 3 Simple Razor
description: This gives you 7 clean shaves and fewer nicks and cuts. Gillette’s Blue Simple3 is equipped with 3 spring mounted blades for a close, smooth and comfortable shave. Its open architecture allows easier rinsing and it features a Lubrastrip for an easy glide as well as a fin guard to help stretch the skin. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
